shortdesc.ph: The SCOPE is delimited content that applies to a particular ConTeXt command.
SCOPE is delimted by curly brackets ({}) immediately following the command as an argument.

section.p: Some commands accept more than one SCOPE.
The content of a SCOPE can be any mixture of text or ConTeXt commands.

link.desc: Placeholders in this documentation are parts of commands that can be specified by the user. Placeholders come in types; some commands require particular types of variables as input.
